about_the_game:
Katyusha's soundtrack contains revised versions of the greatest songs ever written during World War II era.

We composed orchestral revisions of the most epic World War II songs which were written before, during and after WW2, such as Katyusha, Soviet army is the strongest, Farewell of Slavianka, Battle of Moscow and more traditional, such as Kalinka. The final result is a must have for every World War II fan.
The list of songs contains 17 masterpieces, 14 from Soviet Union and 3 from other countries.

Composers: Bill Milios, John Kyr and Nikos Haldoupis.
Music arrangements: Manos Gryparis.
detailed_description:
Katyusha's soundtrack contains revised versions of the greatest songs ever written during World War II era.

We composed orchestral revisions of the most epic World War II songs which were written before, during and after WW2, such as Katyusha, Soviet army is the strongest, Farewell of Slavianka, Battle of Moscow and more traditional, such as Kalinka. The final result is a must have for every World War II fan.
The list of songs contains 17 masterpieces, 14 from Soviet Union and 3 from other countries.

Composers: Bill Milios, John Kyr and Nikos Haldoupis.

legal_notice: Katyusha soundtrack includes music tracks from World War II, revised and remastered by our music composers, according to the <u>copyright law</u>. All rights reserved. Usage of the soundtrack outside your personal usage is not allowed without our written concent. For more information please contact Loresoft.
name: Katyusha Soundtrack
reviews:
“An excellent addition with 17 compositions of Soviet military songs”
Sokol
short_description: One of the greatest soundtracks ever made for a World War II themed video game. Katyusha's soundtrack contains revised music from World War II era, mostly from Soviet Union. We also created 3 revisions of classic songs from USA, Germany and Albania, as well as the boss fight music track.
